meta.title: Documentation - Mataresit
meta.description: Your complete guide to using Mataresit.

hero.title: Application Documentation
hero.subtitle: Your complete guide to using Mataresit.

whatIs.title: What is Mataresit?
whatIs.description: Mataresit is an intelligent application designed to eliminate the manual data entry associated with receipt and expense management. By leveraging Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and advanced AI models like Google's Gemini, it automatically extracts, categorizes, and normalizes your receipt data, saving you hours of work and ensuring your financial records are accurate and organized.

automatedExtraction.title: Automated Data Extraction
automatedExtraction.description: Upload a receipt image (JPEG, PNG, PDF), and our system automatically pulls key information like merchant, date, total, and line items.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Enhancement
aiPowered.description: Goes beyond simple OCR. Our AI normalizes merchant names, standardizes payment methods, predicts expense categories, and even suggests corrections for potential OCR errors.

confidenceScoring.title: Confidence Scoring
confidenceScoring.description: Every extracted field is given a confidence score, so you can see at a glance which data points are highly accurate and which may need a quick review.

realTimeProcessing.title: Real-time Processing Feedback
realTimeProcessing.description: Watch your receipts get processed in real-time with a detailed status timeline, from upload to completion.

semanticSearch.title: Intelligent Semantic Search
semanticSearch.description: Find any receipt or line item by asking questions in natural language, like "coffee expenses from last month" or "what did I buy at Walmart?".

batchProcessing.title: Batch Processing
batchProcessing.description: Upload multiple receipts at once and let the system process them in parallel, with full control over the queue.

analysisReporting.title: Analysis & Reporting
analysisReporting.description: Visualize your spending habits with our analysis dashboard and generate detailed PDF reports summarized by category or payer.

flexibleAI.title: Flexible AI Model Selection
flexibleAI.description: Choose between different AI processing methods (AI Vision vs. OCR + AI) and models to balance speed, cost, and accuracy.

steps.navigate: Navigate to the Dashboard: After signing in, you'll land on your main dashboard.
steps.openModal: Open the Upload Modal: Click the "Upload" button. This will open a modal with two tabs: "Single Upload" and "Batch Upload".
steps.selectFile: Select a File: In the "Single Upload" tab, you can either drag and drop a receipt file (JPG, PNG, or PDF) into the designated area or click to browse your computer.
steps.processing: Processing Begins: Once a file is selected, the upload and processing begin automatically. You can monitor the progress in real-time via the Processing Timeline.
steps.reviewSave: Review and Save: After processing is complete, you will be automatically redirected to the Receipt Viewer page to review, edit, and save your receipt.

understandingDashboard.title: Understanding the Dashboard
understandingDashboard.description: Your dashboard is your central hub for managing receipts.

features.receiptCards: Receipt Cards: Each card represents a receipt, showing the merchant, date, total, and a thumbnail of the image.
features.statusIndicators: Status Indicators: "Unreviewed" (Yellow) means the receipt needs your approval; "Reviewed" (Blue) means it's confirmed.
features.filteringSort: Filtering & Sorting: Use the controls at the top to search, filter, and sort your receipts.
features.viewMode: View Mode: Switch between Grid, List, and Table views.

uploading.title: Uploading Receipts (Single & Batch)
uploading.description: Mataresit supports both single and multiple file uploads. The **Batch Upload** feature allows you to process multiple receipts in parallel, with controls to start, pause, and retry failed uploads, making it ideal for handling large volumes of receipts efficiently.

aiSuggestions.title: AI Suggestions & Confidence Scores
aiSuggestions.description: Our AI provides insights to ensure accuracy. If it detects a potential OCR error, it will offer a suggestion you can accept with one click. Every key field also has a confidence score, visually represented by a colored bar:

confidenceLevels.medium: Yellow (60-79%): Medium confidence, may need a quick look.
confidenceLevels.low: Red (<60%): Low confidence, should be reviewed.

aiSuggestions.editingNote: Editing a field manually sets its confidence to 100%.

aiProcessing.title: AI Vision Processing
aiProcessing.description: Our advanced AI Vision technology provides:

methods.aiVision: AI Vision: The AI model directly analyzes the receipt image, offering superior accuracy for complex or handwritten receipts, various layouts, and different languages.
methods.benefits: Benefits: No intermediate text extraction steps, better handling of visual elements, and improved accuracy for challenging receipt formats.

aiSearch.title: AI Search
aiSearch.description: Navigate to the **AI Search** page to find any receipt or line item using natural language. For example, you can ask: "coffee expenses from last month" or "grocery items over $20".

processingStuck.question: Why is my receipt processing stuck or has failed?
processingStuck.answer: The `processing_status` on the receipt card or in the viewer will show the current stage. If it's `failed_ocr` or `failed_ai`, an error occurred. This can happen with low-quality images. You can either try reprocessing the receipt or manually enter the data.

searchResults.question: Why are my search results not what I expected?
searchResults.answer: Our semantic search relies on "embeddings". If you've uploaded receipts before this feature was enabled, you may need to generate embeddings for them. Admins can do this from the **Admin â†’ Settings** page.

subscription.question: How do I change my subscription?
subscription.answer: You can manage your subscription, view invoices, and update payment methods from the **Stripe Billing Portal**. Access it from the **Features** page or the **Payment Success** page after a transaction.

terms.aiVisionProcessing: AI Vision Processing: Advanced AI technology that directly analyzes receipt images to extract data without requiring separate text recognition steps.
terms.aiVision: AI Vision: A processing method where an AI model directly analyzes an image to understand its content.
terms.embedding: Embedding: A numerical representation of text that captures its semantic meaning, powering our AI Search.
terms.semanticSearch: Semantic Search: A search technique that understands the user's intent and the contextual meaning of words.
